Professional ANPR Hardware

ANPR-SL100

Single Lane Camera

  • • 4K Ultra HD resolution
  • • IR illumination for night vision
  • • IP67 weatherproof rating
  • • PoE+ powered
  • • 99.5% accuracy rate

ANPR-ML200

Multi-Lane Camera (Most Popular)

  • • Covers up to 4 lanes
  • • 8K panoramic resolution
  • • Advanced AI processing
  • • Edge computing capabilities
  • • 99.8% accuracy rate

ANPR-PT300

Portable ANPR System

  • • Rapid deployment in 15 minutes
  • • Battery powered (48-hour operation)
  • • 4G/5G cellular connectivity
  • • Integrated solar charging option
  • • Ruggedized transport case included

Built for harsh environments

Our hardware is designed and tested to operate reliably in the most challenging conditions.

Weather Resistant

IP67 rated enclosures withstand extreme weather conditions from -40°C to +70°C.

High Performance

Process multiple vehicles simultaneously with edge AI computing at up to 200km/h speeds.

Easy Maintenance

Self-diagnostic systems and remote monitoring reduce maintenance requirements by 70%.
